Multilinguale Multiuser Multiblog Maschine.

Version: 0.9

b2evo package: Start page · Install · Blogs · Admin · Online: Manual · Support

Verfügbare Übersetzungen dieser Seite:

Willkommen!

b2evolution is probably the most comprehensive blog engine you can find! It includes almost any feature you could expect from a blog tool, and more! Plus, it's free, it's open-source (GPL), it runs virtually anywhere (PHP/mySQL) and it's available in many languages!

You will find complete information on the official b2evolution website.

Schnellstart Anweisungen:

You can set up b2evolution in a just a few minutes. Just follow the instructions matching your situation:

  • Neue Benutzer: b2evolution ganz neu installieren
  • vorhandene b2evolution Benutzer: upgrading from a previous version of b2evolution
  • Cafelog/b2 Benutzer: upgrading from Cafelog/b2 version 0.6.x
